## Description {#details}

It&#39;s very easy to introduce bugs by passing the wrong string pool.

By using strong types the interface enforces that the right kind of pool is used.

Definition at line 71 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/nonrelocatablestringpool-h">NonRelocatableStringpool.h</a>.
